meanings.definition: Give too much importance to (something) in making a decision or judgment.
meanings.sent1: She tends to overweighting her own opinions when deciding on a movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: It's important not to overweighting one factor when choosing a new car.
meanings.sent3: The cat overweighting the importance of the empty box for its nap.
meanings.sent4: His fear of spiders overweighting his ability to enjoy camping trips.
meanings.sent5: Overweighting the weather forecast led to a disappointing picnic in the rain.

meanings.sent1: The overweighting of the suitcase made it difficult to lift.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised reducing the overweighting to improve overall health.
meanings.sent3: The overweighting of the backpack caused the student to stumble on the hike.
meanings.sent4: The overweighting of the branches caused the tree to bend dangerously.
meanings.sent5: The overweighting of the boat made it sink slowly into the water.
